name: Kelly Club
overview: It's Showtime! Help Kelly Put on A Magic Show! Join Kelly at the clubhouse to play three fun-filled levels of games and activities, where you meet the Kelly Club friends, earn items for the show and win keys to secret areas with magical surprises! - Play eight games that get more challenging each time you play! - Win items for the magic show - a wand, a hat or a rabbit! - Advance to the final warning to discover secret areas and invite friends to the show! - Show off your magic tricks on stage - pull a rabbit out of a hat, make a dove disappear and more!
